overview:
A strategic business development consultant, dynamic, resourceful and enthusiastic individual with extensive line and people management experience gained within customer centric businesses. An original thinker and creative problem solver, able to develop effective interpersonal relationships. Capable of leading and driving change to achieve improved results, utilising key prioritising and planning abilities and possessing excellent presentation skills. Especially productive in high volume, fast paced environments and when dealing with complex issues both of a tactical, strategic, and practical nature.Ability to understand your businesses strengths and weaknesses and offer creative solutions through improved processess and procedures.

Specialties include Building Successful Business Units, Consulting, Business Analysis, Solution Design, Project Management, Change Management, Business Process, Business Development
